Posts.Content: kelsgotacamera wrote: After waiting to 'watch' a lump for six months, I will have a biopsy in a week.  I called the dr. back to ask some questions and got his nurse.  She is so sweet and very helpful.  I had questions about the procedure, but also want to know exactly what what found when I saw this dr. on Nov. 13th.  He did an ultrasound and so far it looks like complex cysts.  Does anyone have any experience with these and what are the chances that it could come back from pathology as anything other than just a cyst?  It's what my mom's b/c started out as several years ago.  I'm just wondering if anyone has any experience or links to info on these type of cysts?  Thanks so much!!! Kelly Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: One week to go.... kelsgotacamera misheley

Posts.Content: kelsgotacamera wrote: I am scheduled for a biopsy on 12/9.  I found the lump in April, had a mammogram and u/s and was told to wait and have it rechecked in 6 months.  I made the appt. to have it rechecked in early Nov. with a breast surgeon.  He found it odd that they put it off for that long with my family history....mom and both maternal aunts have had b/c.  This dr. did an ultrasound and found what could be cysts, but do not have smooth, defined edges and they also do not appear to be clear so we're having a biopsy.They are also hard and do not move....that I can tell. Here's my question. Is it asking too much if I call the dr. back and ask what he may have noted in my records from the u/s?  I would just like to know his wording, etc.  I would also like to know if he found them to be soft/hard, fixed/moveable. Also, the first dr. felt a little place in my opposite breast that this dr. also felt.  It did not show up on the u/s and he's not too concerned about it.  He asked if I wanted it biopsied also.  Should it be?  I feel assured if he felt it was necessary, he would have not given me the option and would just do it also. Sorry for being such a worry wart.  I just want the wait to be over and to have my answers. Thanks in advance for any help and advice Kelly Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Another Question kelsgotacamera kelsgotacamera
